com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Class WCheckBoxSelect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.AbstractWComponent
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.WBeanComponent
        • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.AbstractInput
          • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.AbstractWSelectList
            • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.AbstractWMultiSelectList
              • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.WCheckBoxSelect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AjaxTarget, AjaxTrigger, BeanAware, BeanBound, BeanProviderBound, DataBound, Disableable, Input, Labelable, Mandatable, MultiInputComponent, SubordinateTarget, SubordinateTrigger, WComponent, WebComponent, Serializable

    public class WCheckBoxSelect
extends AbstractWMultiSelectList
implements AjaxTrigger, AjaxTarget, SubordinateTrigger, SubordinateTarget, MultiInputComponent

    WCheckBoxSelect is a convenience class which presents a group of check boxes for the user to select one or more options from. Unlike WCheckBox, the check boxes inside a WCheckBoxSelect will automatically have text labels associated with them. The visual arrangement of the check boxes can be configured using the setButtonLayout(Layout) method.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis, Jonathan Austin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
